tasks.label: Build for Windows on Windows
tasks.command: go build -o builds/windows/RakeCrawler.exe && cp urls.txt blacklist.txt builds/windows

tasks.label: Build for Linux on Windows
tasks.command: set GOOS=linux && go build -o builds/windows/RakeCrawler && cp urls.txt blacklist.txt builds/windows

tasks.label: Build for Linux on Linux
tasks.command: go build -o builds/linux/RakeCrawler.exe && cp urls.txt blacklist.txt builds/linux

tasks.label: Build for Windows on Linux
tasks.command: GOOS=windows GOARCH=amd64 go build -o builds/windows/RakeCrawler.exe && cp urls.txt blacklist.txt builds/windows

tasks.label: Build all on Linux
tasks.command: go build -o builds/linux/RakeCrawler.exe && cp urls.txt blacklist.txt builds/linux && GOOS=windows GOARCH=amd64 go build -o builds/linux/RakeCrawler.exe && cp urls.txt blacklist.txt builds/linux

tasks.label: Build all on Windows
tasks.command: go build -o builds/windows/RakeCrawler.exe && cp urls.txt blacklist.txt builds/windows && set GOOS=linux && go build -o builds/windows/RakeCrawler && cp urls.txt blacklist.txt builds/windows
